Hello,
We're reaching out regarding two important updates to your WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway effective this July.
1. By 8 July 2025, update to the Standard Checkout Experience
You are accepting payments with an older version of the WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway. After 8 July 2025, the integration you are using will no longer be supported, which means that essential performance and feature enhancements will no longer be made to this integration.
Please update to the new Standard Checkout Experience by 8 July 2025 to access a modern checkout with popular payment methods including Link, a wallet built by Stripe.
Make this required change in the WooCommerce Dashboard:
Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > Stripe > Settings
Scroll down to the Advanced settings section
If the "Enable the legacy checkout experience" setting is ticked, untick it
Click Save changes at the bottom
Test the updated changes
If you update your plugin after 8 July 2025, the Standard Checkout Experience will be enabled automatically.
2. On 22 July 2025, update to plugin version 9.7 to receive a promotional trial of Klarna
Version 9.7 of the WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway is coming on 22 July 2025. With version 9.7, Klarna will be automatically enabled at a promotional price from 22 July 2025 to 23 October 2025.
With Klarna, customers can finance purchases and pay them back in fixed instalments over time. Businesses who offer this payment method receive the full payment upfront and can gain up to a 14% increase in revenue.
What to expect:
On 22 July 2025, update to version 9.7 of the WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway if you do not receive automatic plugin updates.
With version 9.7, Klarna will be enabled at a promo price of 1.7% + $0.30, which is equivalent to your pricing for domestic cards from 22 July 2025 to 23 October 2025.
After 23 October 2025, pricing for Klarna will revert to the standard pricing of 4.99% + $0.55.
You can turn off Klarna at any time by visiting the settings page of the Stripe Dashboard.
For more information about these changes, see our support page. If you have additional questions, please reply to this email and a Happiness Engineer will be glad to help.
- The Stripe and WooCommerce teams

Stripe emails you about important updates for Artiste Plastic Surgery Pty Ltd, like plugin requirements. Learn more

If you no longer use the WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway in your site, you can disregard this email.

If you have an account located in the EEA/UK: Stripe Payments Europe, Limited is an Irish limited company with registered number 513174 and a registered office at 3 Dublin Landings, North Wall Quay, Dublin 1, D01 C4E0, Ireland.
